input.sentences: the walls were freshly painted with murals .
the ministers clothing was on display .
the church is ready for the grand ceremony that is to come .
output.sentences: The town had a statue for Martin Luther King Jr. put up.
They put a muerel behind the statue to depict his work.
They put his robes in the church next to the statue.
His tomb was also outside the church.
People went to the church to honor his memory on his birthday.
